title: De Paul influence key to Atleti´s title charge, says Simeone
description: Rodrigo De Paul’s form has been key to Atletico Madrid’s bid for LaLiga glory, head coach Diego Simeone said on the eve of Saturday’s tussle with Villarreal. De Paul, a World Cup and Copa America winner with Argentina, has earned plaudits for his contributions at both ends of the pitch during a spell in which […] The post De Paul influence key to Atleti´s title charge, says Simeone appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Kolo Muani available to make Juventus debut against Napoli
description: Juventus’ new signing Randal Kolo Muani is set to make his debut in Saturday’s Serie A game at Napoli, head coach Thiago Motta revealed on Friday. Juve signed France forward Kolo Muani from Paris Saint-Germain on loan on Thursday, making him their second signing of the January transfer window after the arrival of right-back Alberto […] The post Kolo Muani available to make Juventus debut against Napoli appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
